name: Sarah & James M.
text: Susie transformed our home selling experience. Her marketing was impeccable, and we sold for well over asking price in just days.

name: Michael R.
text: The attention to detail Susie provides is unmatched. She found us an off-market gem that checked every single box on our list.

name: Jessica T.
text: Professional, knowledgeable, and incredibly responsive. Susie navigated a complex negotiation with ease and grace.
